"The Seasonal Event":
"\"Seasonal Events\" are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change.

In addition, the ARKS Technology R&D Staff member, Xiemmy, appears in all ARKS bases to act as a guide for the event."

"During this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related Daily/Weekly Tasks.

To learn more about the Seasonal Event, talk to Xiemmy and select \"Learn about the Seasonal Event\"."

"In addition to all of the above, a special Gathering Material called Randomite will appear throughout each Region.

Randomite will drop many different types of Ore when destroyed.

You can find Randomite more easily by activating the \"Ore\" feature of your Mag's Active Sonar."
